description.ko: 구조적 질서와 디지털 혼돈 사이의 섬세한 경계를 상징하며, 디지털 아티팩트로 분해되는 어두운 기하학적 구조를 묘사합니다.
description.en: A depiction of a dark, geometric structure disintegrating into digital artifacts, representing the delicate boundary between structural order and digital chaos.

prompt: A massive, brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian monolith suspended in a clinical #FFFFFF void, undergoing a violent geometric metamorphosis. The structure fractures into a recursive torrent of sharp #808080 shards and #C0C0C0 digital scanline glitches. High-contrast cinematic lighting with razor-sharp raytraced reflections on fragmented glass surfaces. Chaos within order, pixel sorting effects, and deep digital noise textures. 8k resolution, Octane Render, capturing the perfect balance of a collapsing digital reality through sharp angles and monochrome complexity.
